物見: (ものみ) - sightseeing; a scout; keeping watch
物見遊山: (ものみゆさん) - (yoji) going on a pleasure jaunt
物解り: (ものわかり) - understanding (of people's circumstances and feelings); perceptiveness; sympathy; wisdom
物解りのいい: (ものわかりのいい) - (exp,adj-ix) sensible; understanding
物解りの良い: (ものわかりのよい) - sensible; understanding
物言い: (ものいい) - manner of speaking; verbal argument; objection/protesting a decision (esp. that of a sumo referee); rumor/rumour
物言う: (ものいう) - to talk; to carry meaning
物言えば唇寒し秋の風: (ものいえばくちびるさむしあきのかぜ) - Silence is golden
物言わねば腹膨る: (ものいわねばはらふくる) - Feel uneasy if something is left unsaid
物語る: (ものがたる) - to tell; to indicate
物識り: (ものしり) - well-informed person; walking dictionary; extensive knowledge
物議: (ぶつぎ) - public discussion; public criticism; controversy
物議を醸す: (ぶつぎをかもす) - to give rise to hostile comment; to arouse criticism; to provoke; to cause a controversy
物議騒然: (ぶつぎそうぜん) - (yoji) tumultuous public discussion; noisy public criticism
物象: (ぶっしょう) - object; natural phenomenon; science of inanimate nature
物販: (ぶっぱん) - sale of goods (as opposed to services)
物貰い: (ものもらい) - beggar; sty (on the eyelid)
物質主義者: (ぶっしつしゅぎしゃ) - a materialist
物質交代: (ぶっしつこうたい) - substance metabolism
物質文明: (ぶっしつぶんめい) - material civilization; material civilisation
物質特許: (ぶっしつとっきょ) - substance patent
物質量: (ぶっしつりょう) - amount of substance
物越し: (ものごし) - with something in between
物足りない: (ものたりない) - unsatisfied; unsatisfactory; insufficient
物量: (ぶつりょう) - amount of material resources
物陰: (ものかげ) - cover; under cover; shelter; hiding
物馴れる: (ものなれる) - to add to one's experience; to become skillful
物騒がしい: (ものさわがしい) - noisy; boisterous; turbulent
牴牾: (ていご) - crossing each other; running counter to; differing; clashing
牴牾く: (もどく) - to censure/to criticize/to criticise/to rebuke/to defy/to disobey; to fashion after/to make in the form of/to imitate
牴触: (ていしょく) - collision/conflict; being contrary/being incompatible/being inconsistent/being contradictory; being in violation (of a law, treaty, etc.)/contravention
特になし: (とくになし) - nothing in particular; none in particular
特ア: (とくア) - Asian countries with strong anti-Japanese sentiment (i.e. China, South Korea, and North Korea)
特上: (とくじょう) - first class plus; extra special
特亜: (とくア) - Asian countries with strong anti-Japanese sentiment (i.e. China, South Korea, and North Korea)
特任: (とくにん) - specially appointed; appointed temporarily for a specific task
特例措置: (とくれいそち) - exceptional measures; measures for exceptional cases; preferential measure
特保: (トクホ) - food for specified health uses (e.g. cholesterol reduction); designated health food
特典: (tokuten) - privilégio, favor especial, benefício, prerrogativa, vantagem, comodidade
特典映像: (とくてんえいぞう) - bonus footage (e.g. behind-the-scenes interviews), such as that included on DVDs of movies, television programs, etc.
特写: (とくしゃ) - exclusive photographing (e.g. for a magazine)
特別エディション: (とくべつエディション) - special edition
特別休日: (とくべつきゅうじつ) - special holiday
特別会: (とくべつかい) - special Diet session
特別会員: (とくべつかいいん) - special member
特別会計: (とくべつかいけい) - special account
特別割引: (とくべつわりびき) - special discount
特別区: (とくべつく) - special ward (esp. of Tokyo); special economic zone (China); special administrative region of China (e.g. Hong Kong)
特別号: (とくべつごう) - special number; special issue
特別国会: (とくべつこっかい) - special Diet session
特別地方公共団体: (とくべつちほうこうきょうだんたい) - special local public entity
特別報酬: (とくべつほうしゅう) - special reward
特別委員会: (とくべついいんかい) - special committee; ad hoc committee
特別少年院: (とくべつしょうねんいん) - advanced juvenile training school; special reformatory; juvenile hall for grave offenders
特別展: (とくべつてん) - special exhibition (at museum, etc.)
特別展望台: (とくべつてんぼうだい) - special viewing platform (even higher viewing platform)
特別市: (とくべつし) - special city; special municipality; direct-controlled municipality
特別幕僚: (とくべつばくりょう) - special staff
特別弁護人: (とくべつべんごにん) - special counsel
特別引出し権: (とくべつひきだしけん) - special drawing rights; SDR
特別待遇: (とくべつたいぐう) - special treatment
特別急行: (とくべつきゅうこう) - limited express train
特別手配: (とくべつてはい) - (abbr. of 警察庁指定被疑者特別手配)  (the police) wanting (someone) for questioning; having (someone) on the wanted list
特別扱い: (とくべつあつかい) - preferential treatment; special treatment/discrimination; express delivery/special delivery
特別抗告: (とくべつこうこく) - special kokoku appeal
特別捜査本部: (とくべつそうさほんぶ) - special investigation headquarter
